CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solutions were spincoated onto PEDOT : PSS - coated ITO substrates.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| ITO |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "PEDOT : PSS" and "ITO".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| ITO |

The two entities "PEDOT : PSS" and "ITO" are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. The other entities such as "solutions" and "substrates" are not "Material Name" entities.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solutions were spincoated onto PEDOT : PSS - coated ITO substrates.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| spincoated |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| ITO substrates |

The three "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "spincoated", "PEDOT : PSS", and "ITO substrates". These entities are mentioned as properties of the solutions in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| ITO |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Material Property" entities are "PEDOT : PSS" and "ITO". These entities are mentioned as materials that the solutions are spincoated onto. The term "spincoated" is not a material property, but rather a process or method. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.
